item.description:
Join us for a summer pub crawl and an Olympic viewing party as well!

Here's the schedule:

2:00 p.m. - Jillian's (2nd Floor)
3:00 p.m. - Lansdowne Pub
4:00 p.m. - Bleacher Bar
5:00 p.m. - Cask'n Flagon
6:00 p.m. - Game On
7:00 p.m. - Boston Beer Works
8:00 p.m. - Yard House

Feel free to bring along your friends.

Please maintain your own bar tabs and be sure to tip your servers, they work hard.
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my picture and so should you! Just look for the tall guy at the bar.
item.name: Olympic Lansdowne Street Pub Crawl
